text: Saleh ne kaha â€œ aey biradaraan-e-qaum, tumne kuch is baat par bhi gaur kiya ke agar main apne Rubb ki taraf se ek saaf shahadat rakhta tha, aur phir usne apne rehmat se bhi mujhko nawaz diya to iske baad Allah ki pakad se mujhey kaun bachayega agar main uski nafarmani karoon? Tum mere kis kaam aa sakte ho siway iske ke mujhey aur zyada khasare(nuksan) mein daal do
